name: builtin/punctuation_adder
description: 自动标点恢复插件，使用机器学习模型为英文文本自动添加标点符号
author: SubtitleFormatter Team

enabled.description: 是否启用标点恢复功能

model_name.description: 使用的标点恢复模型名称

capitalize_sentences.description: 是否将句子首字母大写

split_sentences.description: 是否将文本分割为句子

replace_dashes.description: 是否将破折号替换为逗号

examples.input: hello world this is a test without punctuation
examples.output: Hello world, this is a test without punctuation.
examples.description: 添加标点符号和首字母大写

examples.input: this is a long sentence that needs punctuation and capitalization
examples.output: This is a long sentence that needs punctuation and capitalization.
